page.title: 03Education 1
page.content:
There are three primary schools and one comprehensive secondary - Barrowcliff, Newby, Northstead and Scalby. All are mixed boys and girls.
{ Barrowcliff school} opened in 1952 and the nursery was added in 1977. There are 220 juniors, 167 infants and 73 part-time nursery pupils with 16.5 teachers plus one special needs teacher. Pupil numbers are levelling out after a number of years of decline. The juniors have 9 rooms, a playground, playing field, main hall, dining room and computer facilities. The infants have a small grassed area, a playground and a hall.
